title: Correct a Payroll Tax Error
description: A business discovers it under-withheld Medicare taxes for an employee in a previous quarter and needs to correct the error.

tasks.description: Identify the specific payroll period and employee with the error.
Calculate the amount of the under-withholding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately determines the amount of the tax shortfall.

tasks.description: Prepare and file Form 941-X, Adjusted Employer's Quarterly Federal Tax Return or Claim for Refund, to correct the error.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully prepares the corrective form.
